description.p: Make a weapon attack. Even on a miss, a seismic ripple emanates from you, targeting a creature within 15 feet of you (which could be the same or a different target). This creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 thunder damage and be thrown off balance, landing prone

Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal the usual damage and distress a substantial portion of the target’s skin. The next time the creature takes damage before the end of your next turn, it suffers an extra 1d6 damage.
Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal your usual damage and bask in a soft luminescence of sacred golden light that bestows upon you 1d6 temporary hit points for 1 minute.

Make a weapon attack. Then, choose either yourself or a willing creature within 30 feet, and generate an unseen barrier for protection. The beneficiary gains a +2 bonus to AC against all attacks, and a +2 bonus on all saving throws until the start of your next turn.

Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal the usual damage and destabilize the enemy, causing it to lose the ability to make Opportunity Attacks and suffer a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn .

Augment your legs to move up to half your base speed, ignoring difficult terrain, before making a weapon attack. If at least 10 feet of this movement is completed in a straight line, your attack deals 1d6 extra damage.

Infuse your weapon with dragon-fire and make a weapon attack. On a hit, the target takes the usual damage plus an extra 1d6 fire damage. The extra fire damage increases to 2d6 at 7th level, 3d6 at 10th level, 4d6 at 13th level, 5d6 at 16th level, and 6d6 at 19th level.

Choose either yourself or a creature within 5 feet. An icy barrier springs up as a shield against the onslaught until the end of your next turn. The creature under protection receives an AC bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier against the next attack.

You effortlessly move at your speed, ignoring difficult terrain and not invoking attacks of opportunity. Any creature within a 5-foot radius during your movement suffers 1d6 lightning damage. Each creature can only take this damage once per use of this power.

Your dragon-heartened courage motivates either yourself or an ally. A willing creature of your choice within a 15-foot radius gets a +1d6 bonus on its next attack roll. Additionally, any Frightened condition on that creature is immediately removed.

Your weapon erupts with elemental energy. Make a weapon attack and on a hit, deal the usual damage plus an extra 1d8 of the same type as your Draconic Soul. If your attack misses, the target takes 1d6 damage of the same type.

A visibly magical fog billows from your breath, covering a circular area of 15 feet around you. It remains stagnant until the start of your next turn, providing a half-cover to all creatures enveloped by it. A moderate or greater wind speed (at least 10 mph) instantly disperses the fog.

You invigorate an ally with dragon-like vitality. A willing creature you can see within 15 feet can react by using up to half of its available Hit Dice to regain hit points. Additionally, if at least 1 Hit Dice is expended, it gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence bonus for 1 minute.

Make a weapon attack that summons a gust of wind in its wake. After the attack (even if it misses), the wind shields you and another willing creature you can see within 30 feet, granting both of you a +1 AC bonus until your next turn. In addition, if that creature becomes a target, you can use a reaction to swap positions and become the target instead.

Your supernaturally quick movement leaves your adversary open. Make a weapon attack; on a hit, deal the usual damage, and the target must succeed a Dexterity saving throw. Failure results in an ally within 15 feet being able to spend its reaction to move up to 10 feet and make an opportunity attack against the target.

Your weapon lands a precise hit, rending the target’s defenses. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage and leave the target vulnerable until your next turn, granting advantage to the first attack roll against it on each turn.

You imbue the target’s skin with mystical draconic scales, providing additional fortification. You or a willing creature within 30 feet gains 1d12 temporary hit points for the next minute. This increases to 2d12 at 10th level and 3d12 at 16th level.

Swing your weapon with a mighty force to knock your enemy away. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage and, if the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed a Strength saving throw or take 1d10 damage and be pushed 20 feet in a straight line. If another creature obstructs the path, the movement halts, and that creature bears the same 1d10 damage.
The distance increases to 30 feet and damage to 2d10 at 10th level, then further to 40 feet and 3d10 at 16th level.

Curse those who attack your comrades while in your vicinity. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage, and the target must succeed a Wisdom saving throw or bear your draconic energy curse until the end of your next turn.

If the cursed target is within 20 feet of you and strikes a creature other than you, it takes damage equal to half the damage dealt to the other creature. The damage matches the type of your Draconic Soul.

Imbue your weapon with draconic elemental powers for a forceful strike. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage and an extra 2d12 of one of these types at your choice: Fire, Ice, Lightning, Acid, or Poison.

Compel your adversaries to focus their attacks on you. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target is compelled to attack you. Gain a +2 bonus to your AC against the target, and if the target is within 30 feet of you and targets another creature with an offensive attack or spell, it takes 4d8 psychic damage.
Forfeit your defense to shield your comrades. Until your next turn’s start, suffer a -2 penalty to your AC, and all willing creatures you choose within 30 feet of you gain a +4 bonus to their AC.

Bound over a distance up to your base movement maximum (clearing obstacles of up to 20 feet high), landing in an unoccupied space. Every creature within 10 feet of your landing space must succeed a Dexterity saving throw or take 5d6 bludgeoning damage (half on a successful save).

Infuse your weapon with static energy to impair your foes’ movements. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage, and the targeted creature must succeed a Constitution saving throw or take 1d10 damage and lose 10 feet of all movement speeds for 1 minute.

During this minute, the target is charged with static energy, and whenever you hit it with your weapon attack, it loses an extra 10 feet of its speed and takes an extra 1d10 lightning damage (with no saving throw). If its speed becomes zero, the creature takes a final extra 2d10 lightning damage, and this effect ends.

Engulf your weapon in flames and attack every creature within your vicinity in a flaming spin attack. All creatures within 15 feet of you must succeed a Dexterity saving throw or sustain 3d12 fire damage (half on a success).
The damage increases to 4d12 at 13th level and 6d12 at 19th level.
Infuse your weapon with chilling cold that permeates the area around you. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its damage and create a 15 feet aura around you, lasting until your next turn ends.

All creatures of your choice within the aura, or those entering it for the first time, are required to pass a Constitution saving throw. Failure results in them taking 3d8 cold damage, while success halves the damage inflicted. The area is considered difficult terrain for all other creatures except you. Upon reaching the 16th level, the damage escalates to 5d8.

Unleash a bolt of lightning that energizes and hinders enemy movement. Make a ranged spell attack against a visible target creature within 60 feet. On a hit, the creature takes 3d10 lightning damage and becomes electrically charged until its next turn’s end.
It takes 1d6 electrical damage for every 5 feet of willing movement.

Designate an adversary as your primary foe. Target a creature within 30 feet. The creature must succeed a Wisdom saving throw or become marked. The mark lasts for 1 minute or until you mark another creature or the marked creature becomes unconscious or dies. The marked creature takes 1d10 damage of the type defined by your Draconic Soul and a -1 penalty to AC each time it attacks a creature other than you.

Create a potent cyclone of energy, stretching 10 feet wide and reaching 15 feet high, that travels a straight 30-foot path. Every creature in its trajectory makes a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 4d10 damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The type of damage matches your selected Draconic Soul.

Your draconic energy forms a protective barrier over you or an ally by inscribing a protective rune. A willing creature within a 30-foot radius gains resistance to damage of spells and is immune to spells of 4th level or lower, even if amplified with higher-level slots. If a spell is already affecting the target, its effects are temporarily suppressed. The power remains active until your next turn ends.

Bestow upon yourself or an ally the resilience of a dragon. Until your next turn ends, a willing creature within 20 feet gains resistance to non-magical slashing, piercing, and bludgeoning damage, along with an advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws.

Electrify your foes with polar-opposite charges. Make a ranged spell attack on two distinct creatures within a 60-foot radius. Each struck target receives 3d10 lightning damage and is pushed 10 feet towards the other. If both targets end up adjacent, they take an extra 3d10 lightning damage. The power requires two different targets to activate.

Infuse your feet with energy, granting the ability to stride upon the winds. Gain flight movement equivalent to your walking speed for this turn. Your next attack during this turn deals an additional 1d8 lightning damage for every 10 feet of straight-line flight movement made before the attack. If your turn ends in mid-air, you fall as usual.
Infuse your weapons with fiery energy. It deals an extra 4d6 fire damage to all attacks until the end of your next turn. The damage increases to 4d6 at the 19th level.

Slam your weapon against the ground, triggering a frost energy explosion. All creatures within a 10-foot radius must pass a Constitution saving throw. Those failing take 4d8 cold damage and have their movement speed halved for 1 minute. Successful save results in half damage and no movement penalties. The damage increases to 3d8 at the 16th level and 4d8 at the 19th level.

You unleash a wave of paralyzing energy towards an enemy. A creature within 30 feet must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or suffer 3d10 thunder damage and lose its ability to react or to make extra attacks, if any, until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage with no additional effects. Damage increases to 4d10 at 16th level and 6d10 at 19th level.

Your attack creates an opening for a coordinated assault. Make a weapon attack; on a hit, up to two allies within 30 feet may use their reaction to move up to 10 feet and make a weapon attack against the target.

You unleash a terrifying gaze. Each chosen creature within a 30-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or suffer 5d6 psychic damage and become Frightened for 1 minute. Frightened creatures can attempt the saving throw again at the end of their turn, ending the effect on a success.

Gain 3d10 temporary hit points for 1 minute and may select an ally within 30 feet. Until the start of your next turn, you suffer any damage taken by that ally instead of it. Your resistances, immunities, or damage reductions do not apply to this transferred damage.

With a potent blow, you aim to disorient your target. Make a weapon attack; on a hit, deal its usual damage plus an extra 1d10, and the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the start of your next turn.

You transform into pure energy and pass through your foes. Move up to 30 feet in a straight line, immune to opportunity attacks and able to pass through other creatures. Your path must end in an unoccupied space. Ignore difficult terrain but cannot move through spaces filled by large or larger objects. All creatures in your path must make a Dexterity saving throw, suffering 2d10 lightning damage on a failure or half as much on a success. If you finish your turn air, you fall as normal.

A massive ethereal dragon rises from the ground and strikes at one of your enemies. The dragon manifests on any solid surface within 90 feet and bites a target within 5 feet. Make a melee spell attack; on a hit, the target suffers 2d12 piercing damage and 2d8 energy damage that matches of your Draconic Soul.

Your swift strike slices the air, creating a vacuum that acts as a blade against all in its path. Creatures in a 45-foot long, 5-foot wide line must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or suffer 5d10 slashing damage, halving the damage on a successful save. The damage increases to 6d10 at 19th level.

You summon a defensive fog. Gain 4d8 temporary hit points and choose to create a 20-foot-radius cold fog centered on you, lasting for 1 minute. You and chosen creatures within 30 feet can see clearly through the fog; for others, it’s heavily obscured. Moderate or stronger wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the fog after three turns. Only one instance of Protecting Mists can be active at a time; activating it again immediately dissipates the previous one.

You open a rift in space, letting loose thunderous energy. Choose up to two creatures within 30 feet; they must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or suffer 4d10 thunder damage. Additionally, you can swap the position of each creature that failed its save with you or another willing creature within 60 feet.
Your dragon lineage allows you to unleash a powerful breath attack based on your Draconic Soul:
Blue Dragon. Lightning erupts in a 90-foot line, 5 feet wide. Creatures in the line make a Dexterity saving throw, receiving 6d10 lightning damage on a failed save, or half on a success.
White Dragon. An icy blast fans out in a 60-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a Constitution saving throw, taking 7d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half on a success.
Red Dragon. Fire engulfs a 60-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half on a success.

Your dragonlike perception allows you to exploit your enemies’ weaknesses. Up to three creatures within 60 feet that you can see must make a Constitution saving throw. Failed creatures reveal their weaknesses until their next turn, suffering double damage from your attacks (normal damage for resistant creatures, no damage for immune ones). You learn of any immunity, resistance, or vulnerability the failed creatures have.
Your draconic bloodline confers legendary resilience. Gain 20 temporary hit points and advantage on all saving throws until your next turn.

You manifest an Elemental Barrier that shields you and up to five allies within 30 feet until your next turn. The barrier confers resistance to your Draconic Soul’s damage type. When another creature deals damage to you or a shielded ally, the attacking creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it suffers damage and an effect based on your Soul (half damage and no effect on a success).
Red Dragon. Attacker takes 5d6 fire damage and ignites, taking 1d6 fire damage at the start of each of its turns for a minute, or until the flames are doused.
White Dragon. Attacker takes 4d8 cold damage and is restrained until your next turn ends.
Blue Dragon. Attacker takes 3d10 lightning damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until your next turn ends.

You channel draconic energy into spectral wings for you and your allies. You and up to four allies within 30 feet sprout spectral wings, gaining 60-foot flight speed and the ability to make a bonus action melee attack with 10-foot reach. These attacks deal 3d12 damage of your Draconic Soul’s type, using your intelligence bonus. If the effect ends and a creature is air, it descends gently to the ground.

Your attack opens the enemy’s guard for a follow-up assault. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, deal its usual damage and make two more attacks against the same target. If both extra attacks hit, the target suffers an additional 3d12 damage of the weapon’s type.
Your weapon carries intense heat. Make a melee weapon attack. On a hit, deal its usual damage plus 6d6 fire damage. The target must make a Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of Exhaustion.
our aura shields your allies. Until your next turn, create a 15-foot radius aura. When a creature inside this aura takes damage, you can choose to reduce it by 2d6 (min. 0).

You charge the ground with electricity. Affect a 20-foot square area within 60 feet until your next turn. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the area suffer 3d12 lightning damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be restrained until your next turn ends.
You unleash a flurry of attacks. Make three weapon attacks against a single target, each dealing an extra 1d6 damage and ignoring the target’s damage resistance.

You execute a spinning energy attack that takes the form of a spectral dragon’s tail. Choose any number of creatures within 15 feet; they must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 6d8 damage of the type associated with your Draconic Soul and fall prone. Successful saves result in half damage and no additional effect.

Drawing upon your dragon lineage, you can convert a failed saving throw into a successful one. If you’ve already used a Draconic Power this round, you may opt to take one level of exhaustion to bypass the Draconic Power per round limitation.
After using this power, you cannot use it again until you finish a short rest.
Shield yourself with a frosty barrier of scales, gaining +3 AC until your next turn. Any creature missing a melee attack against you while this effect is active suffers 6d8 cold damage.

By manipulating reality with your dragon power, you teleport up to 30 feet and make a weapon attack. This attack deals an extra 3d8 force damage on a hit. You may also teleport up to two allies within 60 feet to unoccupied spaces adjacent to your target. Then, each of these allies can make a weapon attack against the target. You must see the place to teleport you and the allies.

Emulate a dragon’s flight, creating wings that allow you to ascend without provoking attacks of opportunity. All creatures within 15 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d6 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The wings dissipate at your next turn’s end, and if air, you descend gently, avoiding fall damage.

Destructive flames fall from the sky, dealing massive destruction to the area. All creatures on a 50-foot-radius sphere centered in a point up to 120 feet of you take 11d6 fire damage. They can halve the damage with a successful Dexterity saving throw.

Project a frigid mist that shields you and your allies. Until your next turn, chosen creatures within 20 feet gain resistance to all damage. Enemy creatures entering or starting their turn in the area receive 2d8 cold damage.

Your power disrupts space itself, opening rifts for your allies’ use. Until your next turn ends, once per turn, you and any willing creature within 60 feet of your choice can teleport up to 30 feet at the start of their turn. Teleporting charges the creature with energy, adding 4d10 lightning damage to the first successful attack until the start of its next turn.
